mapper.select: SELECT ex.IDX , ex.CODE1 , ex.CODE2 , ex.EXP_KIND , ex.EXP_MONTH , ex.EXP_MONTH , ex.EXP_BODY , TO_CHAR(ex.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as REG_DATE , TO_CHAR(ex.UP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as UP_DATE , ex.REG_DW_USER_IDX , ex.UP_DW_USER_IDX , ui.USER_NAME as REG_DW_USER_NAME , ui2.USER_NAME as UP_DW_USER_NAME FROM SC_EXPIRATION ex INNER JOIN SC_USER_INFO ui ON ex.REG_DW_USER_IDX = ui.USER_IDX INNER JOIN SC_USER_INFO ui2 ON ex.UP_DW_USER_IDX = ui2.USER_IDX WHERE ex.CODE1 = #{CODE1} AND ex.CODE2 = #{CODE2} AND ex.EXP_KIND = #{EXP_KIND}
